error.message: Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Call to deprecated function format_date(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('date.formatter')->format().
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to dblog_mailer.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
